00084 #if defined(AT86RF212) || defined(CUSTOMRF3)
00085 /* Channel number range
00086   Page 0 (BPSK modulation is used and supported IEEE 802.15.4 2003/2006 )
00087     channel  0: 868 MHz      | 20 Kbit/sec
00088     channels 1 - 10: 915 MHz | 40 Kbit/sec
00089   Page 2 (O-QPSK modulation is used and supported IEEE 802.15.4 2006)
00090     channel  0: 868 MHz      | 100 Kbit/sec
00091     channels 1 - 10: 915 MHz | 250 Kbit/sec
00092 
00093   BOOST mode is enabled automatically only for 11, 10, 9, 8, 7, 6 dBm. All other power values do not use BOOST mode.
00094 */

01251 #endif
01252 #if ((CS_APS_TX_BLOCK_SIZE > (APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE - APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH) ) \
01253                                             || (CS_APS_TX_BLOCK_SIZE == 0))
01254   #undef CS_APS_TX_BLOCK_SIZE
01255   #define CS_APS_TX_BLOCK_SIZE (APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE - APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH)
01256 #endif
01257 
01259 
01271 #if !defined CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE
01272   #define CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE CS_APS_BLOCK_SIZE
01273 #endif
01274 #if ((CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE > APS_MAX_RX_ASDU_SIZE) || (CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE == 0))
01275   #undef CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE
01276   #define CS_APS_RX_BLOCK_SIZE APS_MAX_RX_ASDU_SIZE
01277 #endif
